title: How DeSantis’s Twitter Spaces Event Compares to Past Livestreams
description: The Republican presidential candidate’s announcement on Twitter had a high of about 300,000 concurrent listeners during the event and a total of 3.4 million listeners as of Thursday.

title: Minnesota Governor Vetoes Gig Worker Pay Bill
description: Gov. Tim Walz said the legislation would have raised costs for ordering an Uber or Lyft too high, potentially pricing out Minnesota customers.

title: Microsoft Calls for AI Rules to Minimize Risks
description: Its president, Brad Smith, said companies needed to “step up” and governments needed to “move faster” as artificial intelligence progressed.

title: Tips for Cutting Social Media Use and Being Online in a Healthier Way
description: You don’t have to quit Instagram and TikTok cold turkey. Use these strategies — some practical, some more philosophical — to be online in a healthier or less harmful way.

title: Prompts to Try Asking ChatGPT
description: Our personal tech columnist shares how to improve many parts of your life.

title: Reid Hoffman Is Praising the Virtues of AI
description: Few are as involved in so many different artificial intelligence efforts as Mr. Hoffman, a Silicon Valley investor who co-founded LinkedIn.

title: New York City Moves to Regulate How AI Is Used in Hiring
description: New York City’s pioneering, focused approach sets rules on how companies use the technology in work force decisions.
